articles.title: LA County reports record 7,854 daily COVID-19 cases - KABC-TV
articles.description: On the same day Gov. Gavin Newsom announced new stay-at-home orders that are likely to impact Southern California, Los Angeles County officials reported yet another record-breaking daily case count for COVID-19.
